title: Microsoft’s Xbox Crypto Wallet Plans Unveiled in Leaked Documents
description: In a surprising turn of events, leaked internal documents have revealed that Microsoft has ambitious plans to integrate Bitcoin wallets into its popular Xbox gaming platform. These confidential files, inadvertently exposed during Microsoft’s ongoing legal battle with the Federal Trade Commission (FTC), have ignited a flurry of excitement among both gaming enthusiasts and cryptocurrency aficionados. ... Read more

title: Web3 Gaming Summit 2023 Sets New Heights in the Gaming Revolution
description: The Web3 Gaming Summit 2023, held from September 11th to 12th, was a groundbreaking event that brought together gaming enthusiasts and pioneers in the world of Web3 gaming. Co-organized by ABGA (Asia Blockchain Gaming Alliance) and DeGame, this summit marked a pivotal moment in the gaming industry’s evolution. Under the theme “New Era For Gameplay,” ... Read more

title: 400 Million Unlock Could See XRP’s Price Targeting $0.4120 Next
description:
The whale tracking platform, Whale Alert, shared in an X post earlier today that 400,000,000 Ripple (XRP) was unlocked from escrow at Ripple. The unlocked tokens were worth about $205,914,675. Many of the commenters on Whale Alert’s post believed that this was not a good sign for the remittance token and that the price of […]

The post 400 Million Unlock Could See XRP’s Price Targeting $0.4120 Next appeared first on Coin Edition.
